name: HIBC Barcode Validator
description: This was my attempt at regexing for HIBC barcodes.  It is not good. Sorry
content:
HIBC Barcodes NOT COMPLETE
NO GOOD
PLEASE DONT USE UNLESS YOU FIX THE PROBLEMS

VALID
+14307%C
+MJ88JFDSAFSFSAFASIOU5/$$5143078
+M11111111111111111111153
+$$3141103%2
+$$414110302%5
+$$414111118LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL/SKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK/16D201410303W

+M1111111111111111111115/$$414111118WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW/SWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW/16D20141030F
INVALID
LOT is 19 characters, should be capped at 18:
+$$414111118LOTAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA/SSERIAL/16D2014103021
Serial is 19 characters:
+$$414111118LOT/SSERIALAAAAAAAAAAAAA/16D2014103021
Date invalid format:
+$$A14151118LOT/SSERIAL/16D2014103021
There are just too many false positives to get around.
